{"id":852633375,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1669866007,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"31 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/852633375/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"31.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\nvector <vector<int>> visited;\nint nr,nc;\n    int exploreIsland(int r,int c,vector<vector<int>>& grid)\n    {\n        int area=1;\n        queue <int> qr;\n        queue <int> qc;\n        int dr[4]={+1,-1,0,0};\n        int dc[4]={0,0,+1,-1};\n\n        qr.push(r);\n        qc.push(c);\n\n        while(!qr.empty())\n        {\n            int rr=qr.front();\n            int cc=qc.front();\n            qr.pop();\n            qc.pop();\n\n            for(int i=0;i<4;i++)\n            {\n                int ar=rr+dr[i];\n                int ac=cc+dc[i];\n\n                if(ar<0 || ar>=nr)\n                    continue;\n\n                if(ac<0 || ac>=nc)\n                    continue;\n\n                if(visited[ar][ac]==0 && grid[ar][ac]==1)\n                {\n                    visited[ar][ac]=1;\n                    qr.push(ar);\n                    qc.push(ac);\n                    area++;\n                }\n\n                \n            }\n        }\n        return area;\n    }\n\npublic:\n    int maxAreaOfIsland(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        nr=grid.size();\n        nc=grid[0].size();\n        visited.resize(nr, vector <int> (nc,0));\n        int maxarea=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<nr;i++)\n        {\n            for(int j=0;j<nc;j++)\n            {\n                if(visited[i][j]==0 && grid[i][j]==1)\n                {\n                    visited[i][j]=1;\n                    int area=exploreIsland(i,j,grid);\n                    if(area>maxarea)\n                        maxarea=area;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return maxarea;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island","has_notes":false}
